author: danielsh
msg: FSFS: add a bit of paranoia to updating the ffd->min_unpacked_rev and
ffd->min_unpacked_revprop caches.  This should be idempotent (only cost will be
reading the files every time a write-lock or txn-current-lock is acquired), and
might as well remove some tricky bugs.
Add FS parameter.  Use it to update min_unpacked_rev and
